name: sfchronicle
text:
Jimmy Garoppolo is the 49ers' most talked about player, but he hasnâ€™t been talking to reporters this offseason. He broke a sixth-month silence when he spoke, via Zoom, with a group of local reporters for the first time since Feb. 5.

name: sfchronicle
text:
Many Bay Area parkgoers, when interviewed about their mask choices, said they feel safe without a face covering when sitting outside with friends they trust. 

When do you choose to wear a mask, and when do you feel safe? 

Let us know: https://t.co/IzzZti04oV

name: sfchronicle
text:
Anthony Levandowski, a former engineer for Google and Uber and a developer of technology for self-driving cars, was sentenced to 18 months in federal prison for stealing trade secrets from Google.

https://t.co/93BlGX1P4y
